import React from 'react' import BrandNavbar from '../components/BrandNavbar' import '../styles/volApply.css' import { Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' function VolApply() { function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_gjoo1rj', 'template_rvkzwxp', e.target, ) } return (

Fill the given below form to showcase you interest in the volunteer program.

Email address We'll never share your email with anyone else. Name DOB Address About/Message
) } export default VolApply
